channel.title: [317] DiversityX Most Advanced 2007 The Features Are Upon You
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][u][b]DiversityX 2007 Not A Remake[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt][u][b]About DiversityX 2007:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][u][b][size=12pt]Well ever since I became familiar with Runescape Private Servers I wanted to start a 2007. I actually never really intended for it to happen either. Did a lot of researching countless nights with no sleep and noticed there was WAY to many pk servers out. That was after the fact that I released a PK server. I then shut it down for many reasons that do not relate to this thread. I am just trying to make a nice old school server that will keep you entertained every time you login. I want to provide content most servers cannot implement. Yes It will take time but it is definitely worth it. DiversityX started as a Lost Legacy remake, I then decided I wanted to change it up and make a nice pking server without thinking it was a fail due to the fact. I was competing with the PK servers that are out today. Then I started to think about 2007 again and it HIT me hard. That's when I dropped everything and began this 2007! I hope this will keep you satisfied I hope to give you the best content around but time will actually tell. Enjoy! [/size][/b][/u][/center]
[center][size=10pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]*Choose your own experience Note this comes with rewards for extreme+, adding more features to this as we go. *Potion Decanting *Multiple Skillzones *44 portals with working obelisk for teleporting deeper or lower into the wild. *All skills currently work *Unique features *Unique slayer interface for buying items getting xp cancelling tasks + much more Finished *Amazing Combat *Skillng Zone *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Awesome Client Speed *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *Fun And Also Unique Minigames *Unique Content *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses + There is a lot more to add. This was just a brief thinking.[/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Needs to be done: [/b][/u][/size][/center] [center]Custom minigame 1 of many. Killstreak system. EP system. HD client Full screen client Birds nests Inferno Adze effect Custom Zombies minigame Xp Counter[/COLOR] [/center]
[center][u][b]Development Team:[/b][/u][/center]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Jordan - Server/Client Developer[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][u][b]Demolition - Server/Client/Forums Developer[/b][/u][/center] [center][b]Looking for a experienced client developer. Will pay if I can see work and vouches! [/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Media! [/b][/u][/size][/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/3QWG8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3PfnY.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3Pfuu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3Pfw1.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Wanna become a beta tester? please leave your contact info and name in a post ! Thank-you and have a wonderful day[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Forums are up even though this is NOT released yet. [/SIZE][/U][/B] -
[B][U]Forums are IPB[/U][/B]
[code]Best pictures of life ! http://puu.sh/3RvrO.png, http://puu.sh/3SGnV.png FortaCloud VPS
Update Log
Note I try to get on to work on the server atleast 1st a day there is gonna be times where I sit here for 8 hours+ and have a fit on it :p I just wish better developers would offer help instead of payments. Or teach us more then what we know. Really the only part I have problems is with skills, minigames, and if I was to rewrite the engine. That's where stuff gets tricky for me and I don't know why but in reality I quit RSPS about 2 years and 10 months ago. I came back in March ran my server till April or May then I wanted to start something different I then released Lost Legacy it was supposed to be a project but then I didn't want to continue it then I released Ventus I was told you will have fun with pk servers. Well I thought about it a good 3-4 hours a day or more and I noticed THERE was many pk servers out. So I got thinking and I was like no no no no 2007 with my kind of content and content I can buy from developers would be a fantastic idea. That's when I started this and ever since it's been nothing but happiness instead of stress :D
July 28th 2013
Potion Decanting say you have 28 super restore (3) you do ::decant and you will now have 7 full potions instead of (3) Custom minigame. Colosseum Minigame - Join a lobby and get put on a team, join the game and fight for your team until the end Custom Game Modes - Any type of game mode, this includes choosing a game mode, and having select EXP Slayer Interface - A modified version of the Slayer Interface, still, a great interface Modified Slayer A LOT BETTER
July 29th 2013
Started different cache editing Then had a break was rushing myself way to much
July 30th 2013
Dwarven Rock Cake Also used for dharok pking Had a lot going on today so couldn't really do to to much
July 31th 2013
Started to fix the 821 warnings in eclipse. Need to redo some of this code it's completely messy and needs to be cleaned up for my liking. Yeah people say the are only warnings but in reality yeah they are only warnings but if it was done the right way the first time it shouldn't have this many warnings just pointing that out there. I will not finish this anytime soon like to see you guy's fix 821 errors fast lmao By the time I got done with in real life shit it was to late to do anything, ordered 2lbs of wings and a panzerotti and called it a night
August 1th 2013
Nothing done today, had to do other work and was busy.
August 2nd 2013
I will make up for it since no work was done yesterday hope you enjoy most are very EASY! Redid jad now with 63 waves :) added over 100+ single doors for now! Going to try to do all double doors eventually New spawn-config with more spawns updated easy update tbh Ring of life is now fixed. New yell system yelltag, yell colour, yelling uses 1 PKP per yell added a ::rest command only animation only. For right now anyways Fixed a dupe for trading and staking ;) Empty command with a option of yes or no very useful Fixed the Gmaul special Fixed the Gmaul animation 2 ::players ::players2 one is just simple other gives their rank, kills, deaths, level ::getid useful for admins and owners ofc Veracs will now hit through prayer Time to take a little break I have to cut 2 lawns. Will be coding again in about 2-3 hours :D I am back at it. Just had dinner, had a nap legs were killing me let's see some more updates! Added ring of dueling
August 3rd 2013
Double xp weekends! Implementing a join date Added a simple ::rules command New ::commands with administrator, moderator and player commands Added a ::interface 42000 for players so slayer interface shows up ;) Added a rank command Reduced some lag Fixed combat glitch, which allows you to hit high by switching weapons. Added ::proswitch Added ::resetDefence Added ::resetAttack Added ::resetprayer Added ::resetmagic Added ::resetranged Added ::sit Added ::barrowsfix Added ::adminarmour1 Added ::adminarmour2 Added ::adminarmour3 Added ::masterall for admin+ Added ::rares for admin+ Added ::rares2 for admin+ Added ::godswords for admin+ Added ::getnpc for owner+ Added ::copy owner+ Added ::anim admin+ Added ::spec admin+ Added ::kill owner+ pretty useless tbh good in a way though Added ::sendhome Added ::fall Added ::god Added ::giveadmin Added ::givemod Added ::givedonor Added ::demote Added ::givesponser Added the clickitem for birdsnest now I just need to add the birds nest to the tree ADDED MUSIC TO THE CLIENT. PLEASE ASK FOR SPECIFIC MUSIC TO BE PLAYED ! Will add more to this as we go
August 4th
Started a quest
[/code]
I am Demolition so everyone knows

item.title: [317] DiversityX Most Advanced 2007 The Features Are Upon You
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

The system is much better then most regular systems. I have a good programmer that added it awhile ago. There is no bugs with it. There is over 25-30 tasks you can get. The slayer interface actually makes it much better to use you can buy experience for slayer points ect. Very simple yet very useful.

Um… don’t take this the wrong way but that sounds like you just took Jason’s slayer system and added tasks to it…

Did you at least add the ability to make slayer helmet etc? Did you make it so you need a rock hammer to kill a gargoyle? etc…

Read full topic
item.source: [317] DiversityX Most Advanced 2007 The Features Are Upon You

item.title: [317] DiversityX Most Advanced 2007 The Features Are Upon You
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[center][size=14pt]DiversityX 2007 Not A Remake[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]About DiversityX 2007:[/size][/center]

[center][size=12pt]Well ever since I became familiar with Runescape Private Servers I wanted to start a 2007. I actually never really intended for it to happen either. Did a lot of researching countless nights with no sleep and noticed there was WAY to many pk servers out. That was after the fact that I released a PK server. I then shut it down for many reasons that do not relate to this thread. I am just trying to make a nice old school server that will keep you entertained every time you login. I want to provide content most servers cannot implement. Yes It will take time but it is definitely worth it. DiversityX started as a Lost Legacy remake, I then decided I wanted to change it up and make a nice pking server without thinking it was a fail due to the fact. I was competing with the PK servers that are out today. Then I started to think about 2007 again and it HIT me hard. That’s when I dropped everything and began this 2007! I hope this will keep you satisfied I hope to give you the best content around but time will actually tell. Enjoy! [/size][/center]

[center][size=10pt]Features:[/size][/center]

[center][b][size=12pt]*Choose your own experience Note this comes with rewards for extreme+, adding more features to this as we go.
*Potion Decanting
*Multiple Skillzones
*44 portals with working obelisk for teleporting deeper or lower into the wild.
*All skills currently work
*Unique features
*Unique slayer interface for buying items getting xp cancelling tasks + much more Finished
*Amazing Combat
*Skillng Zone
*All Dupes Fixed
*Many Pk Locations
*All Skills Functioning
*Awesome Client Speed
*Perfect Eco
*Amazing Stability
*Perfect Switching
*Fun And Also Unique Minigames
*Unique Content
*Many Trainning Locations
*A Lot Of Bosses

  • There is a lot more to add. This was just a brief thinking.[/size][/b][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Needs to be done: [/size][/center]
[center]Custom minigame 1 of many.
Killstreak system.
EP system.
HD client
Full screen client
Birds nests
Inferno Adze effect
Custom Zombies minigame
Xp Counter[/COLOR]
[/center]

[center]Development Team:[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Jordan - Server/Client Developer[/size][/center]
[center]Demolition - Server/Client/Forums Developer[/center]
[center]Looking for a experienced client developer. Will pay if I can see work and vouches! [/center]

[center][size=14pt]Media! [/size][/center]

[CENTER]


[/CENTER]

[center][size=12pt]Wanna become a beta tester? please leave your contact info and name in a post ! Thank-you and have a wonderful day[/size][/center]

[SIZE=5]Forums are up even though this is NOT released yet. [/SIZE]

Forums are IPB

[code]Best pictures of life ! http://puu.sh/3RvrO.png, http://puu.sh/3SGnV.png
FortaCloud VPS

Update Log

Note I try to get on to work on the server atleast 1st a day there is gonna be times where I sit here for 8 hours+ and have a fit on it
I just wish better developers would offer help instead of payments. Or teach us more then what we know. Really the only part I have problems is with skills, minigames, and if I was to rewrite the engine. That’s where stuff gets tricky for me and I don’t know why but in reality I quit RSPS about 2 years and 10 months ago. I came back in March ran my server till April or May then I wanted to start something different I then released Lost Legacy it was supposed to be a project but then I didn’t want to continue it then I released Ventus I was told you will have fun with pk servers. Well I thought about it a good 3-4 hours a day or more and I noticed THERE was many pk servers out. So I got thinking and I was like no no no no 2007 with my kind of content and content I can buy from developers would be a fantastic idea. That’s when I started this and ever since it’s been nothing but happiness instead of stress

July 28th 2013

Potion Decanting say you have 28 super restore (3) you do ::decant and you will now have 7 full potions instead of (3)
Custom minigame. Colosseum Minigame - Join a lobby and get put on a team, join the game and fight for your team until the end
Custom Game Modes - Any type of game mode, this includes choosing a game mode, and having select EXP
Slayer Interface - A modified version of the Slayer Interface, still, a great interface
Modified Slayer A LOT BETTER

July 29th 2013

Started different cache editing
Then had a break was rushing myself way to much

July 30th 2013

Dwarven Rock Cake Also used for dharok pking
Had a lot going on today so couldn’t really do to to much

July 31th 2013

Started to fix the 821 warnings in eclipse. Need to redo some of this code it’s completely messy and needs to be cleaned up for my liking. Yeah people say the are only warnings but in reality yeah they are only warnings but if it was done the right way the first time it shouldn’t have this many warnings just pointing that out there. I will not finish this anytime soon like to see you guy’s fix 821 errors fast lmao
By the time I got done with in real life shit it was to late to do anything, ordered 2lbs of wings and a panzerotti and called it a night

August 1th 2013

Nothing done today, had to do other work and was busy.

August 2nd 2013

I will make up for it since no work was done yesterday hope you enjoy most are very EASY!
Redid jad now with 63 waves
added over 100+ single doors for now!
Going to try to do all double doors eventually
New spawn-config with more spawns updated easy update tbh
Ring of life is now fixed.
New yell system yelltag, yell colour, yelling uses 1 PKP per yell
added a ::rest command only animation only. For right now anyways
Fixed a dupe for trading and staking
Empty command with a option of yes or no very useful
Fixed the Gmaul special
Fixed the Gmaul animation
2 ::players ::players2 one is just simple other gives their rank, kills, deaths, level
::getid useful for admins and owners ofc
Veracs will now hit through prayer
Time to take a little break I have to cut 2 lawns. Will be coding again in about 2-3 hours
I am back at it. Just had dinner, had a nap legs were killing me let’s see some more updates!
Added ring of dueling

August 3rd 2013

Double xp weekends!
Implementing a join date
Added a simple ::rules command
New ::commands with administrator, moderator and player commands
Added a ::interface 42000 for players so slayer interface shows up
Added a rank command
Reduced some lag
Fixed combat glitch, which allows you to hit high by switching weapons.
Added ::proswitch
Added ::resetDefence
Added ::resetAttack
Added ::resetprayer
Added ::resetmagic
Added ::resetranged
Added ::sit
Added ::barrowsfix
Added ::adminarmour1
Added ::adminarmour2
Added ::adminarmour3
Added ::masterall for admin+
Added ::rares for admin+
Added ::rares2 for admin+
Added ::godswords for admin+
Added ::getnpc for owner+
Added ::copy owner+
Added ::anim admin+
Added ::spec admin+
Added ::kill owner+ pretty useless tbh good in a way though
Added ::sendhome
Added ::fall
Added ::god
Added ::giveadmin
Added ::givemod
Added ::givedonor
Added ::demote
Added ::givesponser
Added the clickitem for birdsnest now I just need to add the birds nest to the tree
ADDED MUSIC TO THE CLIENT. PLEASE ASK FOR SPECIFIC MUSIC TO BE PLAYED ! Will add more to this as we go

August 4th

Started a quest

[/code]

I am Demolition so everyone knows
